thread.section_title: Manufacturer Express, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Manufacturer Express, Inc. | mfrexpress.com
thread.title: TWISK
thread.title_full: Manufacturer Express, Inc. reviewed by TWISK

author: TWISK
title: TWISK
text:
The wrong item was accidentally shipped to me and the customer service department contacted me to immediately resolve the issue before I was even aware of it. The correction was made immediately and my item was received within 24 hours. Good customer service is always appreciated, but excellent customer service should always be noted.
Thank you again to Rudy at manufactures express.
